title: How to start an autobiography - Quora

response.answer_text: Start systematically collecting raw data - the actual events and people in your life you wish to highlight. A tool like TheBrain is useful - here is an example where I am sorting data and identifying tangential and lateral relationships for future reference: http://autobiography.chinarut.com It doubles as a master index into your life & will support research in this field if this interests you. You do not need to make your development work public.  Publishing is completely optional. Having a framework like this to get started will support you in your writing - good luck!

You have to start from the beginning, because you have to learn the way to proceed. It is my point of view. Every thing should have the perfect starting point. For that, you can start through planning and making a strong schedule.    Get Writing a Biography with Experts they can help you either with some suggestion or any service you request.
